text: Deathtrap is a 1982 American black comedy mystery movie directed by Sidney Lumet and was based on the 1978 play of the same name by Ira Levin. It stars Christopher Reeve, Michael Caine, Dyan Cannon, Irene Worth, Henry Jones, Joe Silver and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * * * *Deathtrap on TCM Category:1982 comedy movies Category:1982 mystery movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:1982 LGBT movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lumet Category:Movies about writers Category:Movies about theatre
title: Deathtrap (movie)
